001package imagingbook.lib.filter.linear;
002
003import imagingbook.lib.image.access.OutOfBoundsStrategy;
004
005/**
006 * This class implements a 2D Gaussian filter by extending
007 * {@link LinearFilter}.
008 * 
009 * @author WB
010 * @version 2020/12/29
011 */
012public class GaussianFilter extends LinearFilter {
013        
014        public static final OutOfBoundsStrategy OBS = OutOfBoundsStrategy.NearestBorder;
015        
016        /**
017         * Constructor.
018         * @param sigma the width of the 2D Gaussian in x- and y-direction
019         */
020        public GaussianFilter(double sigma) {
021                super(new GaussianKernel2D(sigma));
022        }
023        
024        /**
025         * Constructor.
026         * @param sigmaX the width of the 2D Gaussian in x-direction
027         * @param sigmaY the width of the 2D Gaussian in y-direction
028         */
029        public GaussianFilter(double sigmaX, double sigmaY) {
030                super(new GaussianKernel2D(sigmaX, sigmaY));
031        }
032}
